directions: In a large saucepan over medium-high heat, bring rice, chicken, bouillon, onion and water to a boil.  Remove from heat and pour into slow cooker.  Stir in potatoes.  Combine milk and flour and stir until smooth.  Stir into soup mixture.  Cook 6 to 8 hours, until rice and potatoes are tender and flavors are well blended.
ingredients: 3 cups diced, cooked chicken breast meat
title: Chicken Wild Rice Soup III
